actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1789(c) of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to waive the 2-year period of operation requirements in the case of courses offered by the branches or extensions of certain educational institutions.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to waive the two-year period of operation requirement in the case of courses offered by the branches or extensions of certain educational institutions.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1789(c) of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to waive the 2-year period of operation requirements in the case of courses offered by the branches or extensions of certain educational institutions.
